title: Collaborative Design Workshop Based on Vertical Studio Model for Architectural Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Architectural Design Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Professional development program for in-service practitioners, targeting integrated theory-practice learning

learning_goals: Participants can derive at least three practical design strategies through peer mentoring in a vertical studio environment
Learners can perform and incorporate feedback at least twice per stage of the design process through cross-level collaboration
Participants can complete an integrated design project based on cluster themes, reflecting at least 80% of industry field requirements
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
